spec_data.Name: libpmemobj++-devel
spec_data.Description:
The libpmemobj library provides a transactional object store,
providing memory allocation, transactions, and general facilities for
persistent memory programming.

This sub-package contains header files for libpmemobj C++ bindings.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 01:35:01 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: C++ bindings for Persistent Memory Transactional Object Store library
